scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace api" "npm run dev --workspace web"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace api && npm run build --workspace web
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace api" "npm run start --workspace web"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace api && npm run lint --workspace web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace api && npm run lint:fix --workspace web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace api && npm run type-check --workspace web
scripts.pre-commit: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build
